column1: #text=It was the day before my girlfriend 's birthday and I decided to do something special for her !
#text=Her favorite flavor is strawberry so I will make her a strawberry cake as a surprise .
#text=I began by getting the best strawberries and most delicious cake batter from the store I could find .
#text=When I arrived home I turned on the oven and began to make the batter .
#text=I mix the ingredients together and put the cake together .
#text=It then goes in the oven to bake and become golden and perfect for eating .
#text=I take the cake out after it has baked and put sprinkles on top and place the candles .
#text=I write on the cake happy birthday princess !
#text=The next day I surprise her with the best cake that she has ever seen .
#text=She is so surprised that she faints !
#text=After waking back up she enjoys the cake and tells me it is the best that she has had in years .
